message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  We can avoid inflation eating away at the value.
Your offer was a bit too greedy, Alice. Let's be fair to each other. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Bob, it seems like we both want more than the other is willing to give. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take the same split you offered last round, but in my favor - $55 for me, $45 for you.
